Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires advertisements for certain accommodations to be submitted to designated enforcement agency
Summary: Requires advertisements for certain accommodations to be submitted to the designated enforcement agency.
LawCode: Add ยง15, Mult Dwell L; add Title 27 Chap 1 Subchap 3 Art 19 ยง27-287.5, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring advertisements for certain accommodations to be submitted to the designated enforcement agency
